casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Eduardo HERRERA, Defendant-Appellee. No. 81-5544. United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. March 19, 1984. Stanley Marcus, U.S. Atty., William C. Turnoff, Asst. U.S. Atty., Miami, Fla., Frank J. Marine, Appellate Section, Criminal Div., U.S. Dept, of Justice, Washington, D.C., for U.S.A. Ellis S. Rubin, Thomas James O’Grady, Miami, Fla., for Herrara.

Before TJOFLAT, KRAVITCH and HATCHETT, Circuit Judges.

*1017PER CURIAM:

The Court, on its own motion, issues the following correction to United States v. Herrera, 711 F.2d 1546 (11th Cir.1983).

The last sentence in footnote 13 at 711 F.2d 1546, 1554, is deleted.
